title: wine_Domaine_J._Meuret_2014_Phelps_Creek_Vineyard_Les_Chênes_Pinot_Noir_(Oregon)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 128437.
country: US.
description: The second release of this Oregon Pinot project from Walla Walla's Jon Meuret (Maison Bleue) is irresistible. A three-clone blend from a top Columbia Gorge vineyard, it's explosively aromatic, with a strong whiff of pipe tobacco that Meuret believes is a vineyard marker. Those powerful aromatics push into a dense core of strawberry-cherry fruit, enhanced by oak notes. Delicious now, this has the structure and power to cellar well. Drink now through 2028..
designation: Phelps Creek Vineyard Les Chênes.
points: 94.
price: 45.0.
province: Oregon.
region_1: Oregon.
region_2: Oregon Other.
taster_name: Paul Gregutt.
taster_twitter_handle: @paulgwine .
title: Domaine J. Meuret 2014 Phelps Creek Vineyard Les Chênes Pinot Noir (Oregon).
